material: steel wire rope with PVC coating, EVA/foam non-slip handles
usage: Used for skipping and jump rope exercise for workouts, fat burning, cardio training and fitness at home or in the gym.
key_features: Strong and durable rope made of high quality steel wire
Steel wire covered with strong PVC outer layer
Wear-resistant, stable and non-floating wire rope for long service life
Adjustable length design allows customization to user height
Suitable for all ages and all skill levels
Includes a set of spare adjustment buckles
Soft non-slip memory foam / EVA foam grip for comfort and secure hold
Length adjustable with internal latch mechanism
360° swivel / anti-twine steel bearings for smooth rotation
Promoted benefits include improving body coordination, bone density and cardiovascular health
Promoted benefits include helping build endurance and concentration and speeding up calorie consumption
ai_description: Black and red adjustable jump rope with long, faceted cylindrical handles wrapped in soft foam grips. A slim braided steel cable runs between the handles, coated in smooth PVC. Infographics highlight 6-inch handles, 360° swivel hardware and internal latch system for custom length.
target_audience: Men, women and kids looking for an adjustable jump rope for exercise, fat burning workouts and personal training.
product_name: KAKSS Skipping Rope - Jumping Rope Adjustable For Men Women Kids - Jump Rope For Exercise Fat burning Workout Home or Gym personal Training Rope (Black/Red)
